r.d: * Building absolute URIs * RFC compliant HTTP redirects * RFC compliant HTTP date handling * Parsing of HTTP headers and messages * Caching by "Last-Modified" and/or ETag (with 'on the fly' option for ETag generation from buffered output) * Sending data/files/streams with (multiple) ranges support * Negotiating user preferred language/charset * Convenient request functionality built upon libcurl * PHP5 classes: HttpUtil, HttpResponse (PHP-5.1), HttpRequest, HttpRequestPool, HttpMessage
r.n:
+ Added missing support for raw post data in HttpRequest + Added missing HttpMessage::setBody() + Added HttpRequest::METH_* constants + Added HttpRequest::AUTH_* constants + Added HttpMessage::TYPE_* constants + Added HttpResponse::ETAG_* constants + Added HTTP_ETAG_MHASH_* constants + Added supported ETag hash algrithms to php_info() output + Added ETag hashing through PHPs CRC32() implementation + Added new language/charset negotiator
* Changed HttpMessage::toString([include_parent = true]) to false * Renamed HTTP_GET etc. constants to HTTP_METH_GET * Fixed protected property access
